page.title: 17CLUBS
page.content: Humpty Dumpty:0-3yrs + mothers,weekly Playgroup:3-4yrs,thrice weekly. Church groups:Scramblers:3-4yrs,2 Sun/month. Climbers:5-7yrs,2 Sun/month Explorers:8-11yrs,every Fri.evening. Pathfinders:12-14yrs,weekly. Bowhawk:12-16yrs,occ.parish trips. Brownies:girls,7-10,weekly Guidees:girls,11+,weekly. Cubs:boys,8-10,weekly at Crossways. Scouts:boys,11+,weekly at Crossways. Crossways youth centre:6+ in summer Crossways youth group:14+ Young Wives:fortnightly in houses St.Martin's Circle:religious,monthly. Sisterhood:weekly in Methodist chapel. Women's Institute:monthly. Flower Guild:church based. Horticultural Society in Owermoigne. Darby & Joan club:fortnightly,elderly.
